articles.title: ‘I love him’: Marnus Labuschagne responds to criticism of Justin Langer - Fox Sports
articles.description: Marnus Labuschagne has leapt to the defence of Justin Langer after revelations the national coach berated him for taking a toasted sandwich on the field in Brisbane.
articles.content: Reports have surfaced this week of disquiet in the Test team with suggestions players were growing tired of their coachs intense nature in the wake of their humbling series defeat to India on home so… [+3135 chars]
